DOC.brief_summary: This Study is designed to observe the clinical outcomes of patients requiring mitral repair that were treated with the CE certified Cardinal System.
DOC.brief_title: MITRAFIT- Cardinal Adjustable Mitral Repair Follow-up International Postmarketing Surveillance (PMS)
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 years Patient is a candidate for mitral valve repair, with our without concomitant procedures. Subject is willing to give informed consent for collection of his/her clinical data. Severe organic lesions with retracted chordae Congenital malformations with lack of valvular tissue Severe valvular calcifications Evolving bacterial endocarditis Known Sensitivity to Nickel or Chromium
